content.summary: 3 years of experience in software development and product engineering, with a focus on improving workflows, automating repetitive tasks, and delivering high-quality code. Passionate about building scalable applications and mentoring team members. Proficient in:

content.role: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
content.title: University of California, Berkeley
description: Specialization: Systems Engineering, Awards: Dean’s Honors List, National Merit Scholar
Courses: Operating Systems, Machine Learning, Networking, Algorithms, Cloud Computing

content.title: TechWave Inc.
description: Led the development of a cross-platform customer management tool with React Native, increasing productivity for support teams by 25%.
Optimized backend API performance with Node.js and PostgreSQL, reducing query response times by 40%.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker, improving deployment consistency across environments.

content.title: Bright Solutions LLC
description: Designed RESTful APIs for a logistics platform using Python and Flask, enabling real-time tracking and reporting of shipments.
Integrated third-party payment gateways into the platform, ensuring secure and reliable transaction processing.
Created automated unit and integration tests with PyTest, increasing code coverage to 95%.

content.title: NovaTech Systems
description: Contributed to the development of an IoT dashboard, implementing data visualizations with D3.js.
Enhanced the system’s MQTT messaging protocol, reducing latency for real-time data updates by 30%.
Assisted in migrating legacy Java services to modern microservices using Spring Boot.

content.title: AI-Powered Writing Assistant
description: Developed an AI-powered writing assistant with OpenAI’s GPT-3 API, allowing users to generate creative and technical content.
Designed an intuitive UI with Next.js and integrated payment processing for subscription tiers.
Optimized backend processing with Redis caching, reducing API response times by 50%.

content.title: Personal Finance Dashboard
description: Created a personal finance dashboard using React and TypeScript for tracking budgets, investments, and expenses.
Built a backend with Express and MongoDB to store transaction data securely.
Integrated OAuth2 for secure user authentication and data synchronization with financial APIs.

content.title: Real-Time Stock Tracker
description: Built a real-time stock tracking application with a Vue.js frontend and a Go backend for handling API requests.
Integrated third-party financial APIs to retrieve live market data and user portfolio information.
Implemented WebSocket communication to update stock prices dynamically.
